name: This Land is Ours
description:
This Land is Ours is our submission for the 5th Historically Accurate Game Jam.

A game about the Guarani people and their resistance against Europeans.

- Controls

A , LEFT = left      |    D, RIGHT = right    |    S , DOWN= crouch     |  W = Jump  |    SPACE = shoot

- Background art: Guarani pattern of a wing of "popo", a butterfly. It means respect and gratefulness for freedom, because the butterfly is always flying freely, and the Guarani is happy when she flies around their house.
